#summary Command line applications.

Pickit utilities:

    <table>
    <tr valign="top"><td>pickitfwupdate</td><td>Update the pickit's firmware using a Microchip-supplied firmware file</td></tr>
    <tr valign="top"><td>pickitfwversion</td><td>Print the version of the pickit's firmware. </td></tr>
    <tr valign="top"><td>pickitreadieeprom</td><td>Dump the contents of the pickit's internal data EEPROM.</td></tr>
    </table>

SPI flash utilities:

    <table>
    <tr valign="top"><td>readspiflash</td><td>Read an SPI flash device connected to the pickit.</td></tr>
    <tr valign="top"><td>pickitfwversion</td><td>Write an SPI flash device connected to the pickit.</td></tr>
    </table>
